title: Diageo India Introduces Godawan Century, a Limited-Edition Artisanal Single Malt, Celebrating the Great Indian Bustard - PR Newswire
summary: The article highlights the launch of 'Godawan Century,' an artisanal single malt whisky by Diageo India that celebrates heritage, culture, and conservation efforts. The product is presented as a limited-edition collection paying homage to the endangered Great Indian Bustard, with a focus on environmental preservation and sustainable luxury.
